sources.note: Main product page. Describes Crystal PM as optometry office management suite with EHR, scheduling, billing, optical inventory, and 60+ integrations.

Pricing/mandatory disclosures page. Lists in-office and cloud options, core features (demographics, scheduling, billing, records, reporting), and optional add-ons (e-prescribing, secure messaging, FHIR server, machine integration).

Practice management features page. Details scheduling (multi-doctor, drag-and-drop, room tracking), billing (exhaustive component, electronic claims), inventory management, electronic routing slips, and paperless workflows.
EHR features page. Describes 300+ customizable health record templates, automated ICD-10 coding, custom procedures, and Microsoft Office integration for reports and patient education.
Cloud EHR page. Describes cloud deployment with air-gapped backups, equipment integrations (Zeiss, Marco, Optos, Humphreys), multi-device access, and average 3-minute support response time.

RCM page for Abeo Billing service. Details claim submission methods, payment posting (insurance, patient, refunds, NSF), A/R management, appeals, and optional services (credentialing, fee analysis, insurance verification, patient statements).

Patient engagement page. Describes Schedule Your Exam (real-time online scheduling), Crystal Communicator (texting for reminders/recalls), Crystal Kiosk (check-in, insurance card upload, HIPAA signatures), patient portal, and online forms.

Integration partners page. Lists 50+ partners across 15 categories: analytics, billing/RCM, cloud, credit card processing, direct messaging, e-prescribing, file management, HIPAA, insurance, optical/CL ordering, patient engagement, telehealth, website services.

Third-party EMR review site. Confirms features: EHR with 300+ templates, multi-doctor scheduling, electronic claims, inventory with RFID, e-prescribing, patient portal, Android/iOS apps. Lists clearinghouse integrations (Apex, Trizetto, Waystar, VSP).

Capterra profile (403 on fetch but search results provided review summaries). Users rate 4.2-4.5 stars. Praise customizability and billing integration. Complaints about dated interface and occasional freezing.
Software Advice profile (403 on fetch). Search results confirmed user reviews praising scheduling and insurance modules, with concerns about customer service responsiveness.
ProPublica PPP loan data. Shows company DBA as 'Abeo Solutions Inc. DBA Opto Or Crystal Practice Management' with 35 reported employees.
Vision Expo East exhibitor listing confirming Crystal Practice Management (Abeo Solutions Inc) exhibits at major optometry trade shows.
Patient portal training document (found via search). Confirms portal features for patient access to records, prescriptions, education, invoices, bill pay, forms, and secure messaging.
